snippet: In her new memoir, Jeanette Winterson reflects on how words became her ticket out of a grim childhood.
abstract: Dwight Garner reviews book Why Be Happy When You Could Be Normal? by Jeanette Winterson.
lead_paragraph: In her new memoir, Jeanette Winterson reflects on how words became her ticket out of a grim childhood.

headline.seo: Jeanette Winterson’s ‘Why Be Happy When You Could Be Normal?’
headline.main: On a Path to Salvation, Jane Austen as a Guide
headline.print_headline: On a Path to Salvation, Jane Austen as a Guide
